Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to telemarketing restrictions during a state of emergency
Summary: Exempts businesses and professional services from certain telemarketing restrictions during a state of emergency; allows such persons to make telemarking sales calls.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to telemarketing calls during a state of emergency
